name: TANKMATES
description:
TANKMATES

---

Keep your dumb fellow fish alive by intercepting drones

wasd or arrow keys to move, space to tail spin

Build up speed and launch yourself out of the tank to take out drones

Hit the buttons on the wall to call in drones or new fish

Fish sparkle when they have a coin, hit them to release it

If you don't feed them for too long they turn green and will soon die

Too many dead fish clog up your tank so hit them out to keep it clean
___
A game made for the 25th gm48 with the theme 'One Tool, Many Uses'
